property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My mother once told me angels sing their swords' names with each strike." - Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Christopher Rush

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice Daraja Griffin: Destroy target black creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And the flamingos said, ‘Get out of our nest - we can't be seen with the likes of you' So, the griffin ate them." - Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Stuart Griffin

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, for each land target player controls in excess of the number you control, choose a land that player controls, then the chosen permanents phase out. Repeat this process for artifacts and creatures. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before that player untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adam Rex

property.name: Type
property.value: World Enchantment

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eye of Singularity enters the battlefield, destroy each permanent with the same name as another permanent, except for basic lands. They can't be regenerated. Whenever a permanent other than a basic land enters the battlefield, destroy all other permanents with that name. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Eric Peterson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That does it I'm going back to hunting chickens" - Rhirhok, goblin archer

property.value: Una Fricker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return Gossamer Chains to its owner's hand: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target unblocked creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Harah swung his sword mightily, but still the air held him fast." - Azeworai, "Kenechi's Dream"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Luke

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, Honorable Passage deals that much damage to the source's controller.

property.value: Jeff Miracola

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. • Target player gains 2 life. • Destroy target Aura.

property.value: Stuart Griffin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You stop breathing for just a few minutes and everyone jumps to conclusions." - Zarkuu, necrosavant

property.name: Artist
property.value: Brian Horton

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Parapet as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no wall that can't be improved by making it taller.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mark Poole

property.name: Rules
property.value: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the tongues of a thousand serpents, this time I do not lie." - Ahmahz il Kin, Suq'Ata diplomat

property.name: Artist
property.value: Roger Raupp

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Relic Ward as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Asmira's prayers alone should have freed Mangara from the amber prison . . .

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Coulthart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These things will protect you while I'm gone, remind you of my love for you." - "Love Song of Night and Day"

property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Rules

property.value: Cecil Fernando

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tread upon the meek, and they shall wound your feet and make you crawl." - Asmira, Holy Avenger

property.value: Nathalie Hertz

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Pay 2 life: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Good is not a ‘thing.' You can neither touch nor own it. No, Good is a vision we all share and strive to make real." - Asmira, Holy Avenger

property.value: Jeff Miracola

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

property.value: Cecil Fernando

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.value: Christopher Rush

property.value: "You know you've angered the gods when the clouds turn against you." - Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

property.value: First the insult, then the injury.

property.value: Richard Kane Ferguson

property.value: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped nongreen creatures they control and pay {2} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

property.value: Jerry Tiritilli

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic is my thread, my will the needle. I weave over you as if you never were." - Poetics of Hanan

It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 0/1 green Sheep creature token.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kevin Walker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player draws X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wealth is a good thing, compared to poverty - your food is better, your robes are softer, and your companions have bathed more recently." - Kipkemboi, Kukemssa pirate

property.value: Dan Frazier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}{U}: Rainbow Efreet phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A beauty made more so by its fleeting visitations." - Teferi

property.name: Artist
property.value: Nathalie Hertz

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) Whenever Shimmering Efreet phases in, target creature phases out. (It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life or death: which is the illusion?" - Naimah, Femeref philosopher

property.name: Artist
property.value: Thomas Gianni

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Shrieking Drake enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kaervek believes the drakes' cries herald his victory; in truth, they mourn aloud for his impending demise." - Teferi

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ian Miller

property.name: Type
property.value: World Enchantment

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses artifact, creature, land, or non-Aura enchantment. All nontoken permanents of that type phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire is dead. Water has killed him." - From The Stories of Nature

property.name: Artist
property.value: Alan Rabinowitz

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top three cards of your library face down. You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled. Until your next turn, you may play those cards. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put any of those cards you didn't play into your graveyard.

property.name: Artist
property.value: George Pratt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Simultaneously, all phased-out creatures phase in and all creatures with phasing phase out.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time may heal all wounds, but what heals time?" - Teferi

property.name: Artist
property.value: George Pratt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oft have I wished to undo past deeds, but never did I imagine they would be undone for me." - Naimah, Femeref philosopher

property.name: Artist
property.value: Terese Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {U}{U}: Enchanted creature phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Careless, like a child with fire, so was I with time." - Teferi

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Matson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player mills four cards. • Choose a land type and a basic land type. Each land of the first chosen type becomes the second chosen type until end of turn. • Target artifact phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.value: Greg Spalenka

property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Waterspout Djinn unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fly us higher, out of its storm." - Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Thomas Gianni

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature each opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your arrogance amazes me, Kaervek. Did you not know the price you would pay?" - Mangara

property.name: Artist
property.value: Terese Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kaervek imprisoned Mangara out of jealousy, but he taints Jamuraa simply out of spite." - Asmira, Holy Avenger

property.name: Artist
property.value: Cliff Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Brood of Cockroaches is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of the next end step, you lose 1 life and return Brood of Cockroaches to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's like waking on a bed of a thousand olives during an earthquake of subtle force." - Afari, Tales

property.name: Artist
property.value: G. Darrow + I. Rabarot

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A rhino's bargain - Femeref expression meaning "a situation with no choices"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once I dreamt of death, but now it dreams of me / And only rats and rotting flesh can hear my silent plea." - Mundungu chant

property.name: Artist
property.value: Paul Lee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts." - Purraj of Urborg

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tom Kyffin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, its controller loses life equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch death wait / Wait, death, watch / Steal breath swiftly / but steal life slowly." - Suq'Ata dirge

property.name: Artist
property.value: Brian Horton

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, each player who tapped a land for mana this turn sacrifices a land. Desolation deals 2 damage to each player who sacrificed a Plains this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kill a creature, destroy the present. Kill the land, destroy the future." - Kaervek

property.name: Artist
property.value: George Pratt

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) Fallen Askari can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In troubled times, there are few greater sorrows than a wayward savior.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adrian Smith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a nontoken permanent. If you do, target opponent loses 2 life unless that player sacrifices a permanent or discards a card. You may repeat this process any number of times.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Christopher Rush

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player discards a card. • Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn. • Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Greg Spalenka

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return X Swamps you control to their owner's hand. Infernal Harvest deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I offered you eternal life; I just didn't say where." - Shauku, Endbringer

property.name: Artist
property.value: Nathalie Hertz

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice all permanents you control and discard your hand. Target player loses 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The end justifies the means. What do I care if I rule over the dead rather than over the living? The dead ask fewer questions." - Kaervek

property.name: Artist
property.value: Bryan Talbot

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Necromancy as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. When Necromancy enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Necromancy." Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control and attach Necromancy to it. When Necromancy leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Zombie Giant

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, I remember my first death." - Zarkuu, necrosavant

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Coulthart

property.value: Human Assassin

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My betrayal is certain - but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say." - Jolrael

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adrian Smith

property.name: Type
property.value: World Enchantment

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may sacrifice a creature. If that player doesn't, they lose 5 life and you sacrifice Pillar Tombs of Aku.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aku, City of Hidden Graves / Aku, City of Lost Kings / Aku, welcome me." - Pillar tomb inscription

property.name: Artist
property.value: Terese Nielsen

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?" - Hakim, Loreweaver

property.value: Steve White

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Assassin

property.name: Rules

property.value: Tony DiTerlizzi

property.value: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I write upon clean white parchment with a sharp quill and the blood of my students, divining their secrets." - Shauku, Endbringer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Vampirism enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control. Other creatures you control get -1/-1.

property.value: Gary Leach

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So the vulture said to the griffin, ‘You gonna eat that?'" - Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

property.value: Jeff Miracola

property.name: Rules

property.value: "The blood on my hands is merely proof of my ambition." - Kaervek

property.value: Flying When Bogardan Phoenix dies, exile it if it had a death counter on it. Otherwise, return it to the battlefield under your control and put a death counter on it.

property.name: Artist
property.value: David O'Connor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Dwarven Vigilantes attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Dwarven Vigilantes assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some dwarves can only be pushed so far.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Type
property.value: World Enchantment

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player exiles a card at random from their hand. The player may play that card this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if the player hasn't played the card, they put it into their graveyard.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jerry Tiritilli

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Michael Danza

property.value: Scott Kirschner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Swine-Rider becomes blocked, it deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and each blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you get the mount you deserve." - Suq'Ata curse

property.name: Artist
property.value: G. Darrow + I. Rabarot

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact creature. • Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn. • Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Greg Spalenka

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Blue creatures can't block creatures you control. Nonblue creatures can't block creatures you control unless their controller pays 1 life for each blocking creature they control.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Alan Rabinowitz

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hulking Cyclops can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some say a great cyclops turns the world in its hands, looking down upon it with its one bright eye." - Afari, Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Keeper of Kookus gains protection from red until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, if you don't control a creature named Keeper of Kookus, Kookus deals 3 damage to you and attacks this turn if able. {R}: Kookus gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.value: Scott Hampton

property.name: Flavor

Black creatures can't attack you. Nonblack creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.value: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) Creatures with flying can't attack or block, and their activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wind will win, whatever we wish.

property.value: Gary Gianni

property.value: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a rust counter on each artifact target opponent controls. Then destroy each artifact with mana value less than or equal to the number of rust counters on it. Artifacts destroyed this way can't be regenerated. When Corrosion leaves the battlefield, remove all rust counters from all permanents.
